message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate the opportunity, but I am only able to pay up to $175 for it.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer! I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell it to you for $185.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I am still unable to meet at $185. I would like to propose $170 for the product.
Hi Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I'm still a bit hesitant to go lower than $185, but I'm willing to make one more adjustment. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
